Eligibility Criteria For Admission In First Year
The candidates, who have clearly passed (without grace) intermediate examination of U. P. Board or 10+2 level examination or its equivalent from any recognized Board/University; securing minimum 50% (45% for SC/ST) marks in total of required subjects (Physics, Chemistry, Math's/Biotechnology/Biology), i eligible for admission to first year of B.
